attributes.action: Stop the changes to pip, UC and all benefits reductions
attributes.additional_details:
Withdraw changes to the eligibility of benefits. Withdraw all changes that could result in loss of benefits for I'll and disabled people.

Liz Kendall and reeves to resign
attributes.background: This government was elected as a labour government but has completely betrayed it's voters with these benefit cuts.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disability Benefits: Stop Changes to PIP and Universal Credit
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721828

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
